tasks.task: Clamp a replacement rOWER to the combine harvester
subtasks: Identify the correct rOWER replacement part
Loosen the securing bolts on the existing rOWER
Lift and remove the old rOWER
Align the new rOWER with the mounting points
Secure the new rOWER in place using bolts
Tighten the bolts with appropriate torque

tasks.task: Engage the elevator to lift grain into the grain tank
subtasks: Locate the elevator control lever on the combine harvester
Press the lever to initiate elevator operation
Monitor the grain flow into the tank and adjust speed as necessary

tasks.task: Unload grain from the combine harvester onto a grain truck
subtasks: Position the grain tank spout over the grain truck's hopper
Activate the unloading mechanism, such as the auger or hydraulic suction
Monitor the unloading process for any issues
Once unloaded, disconnect the grain tank from the combine harvester

tasks.task: Recognize a picker head needing adjustment and make the necessary corrections
subtasks: Inspect the picker head for clogs or damage
Use tools to open the picker head and clear any blockages
Adjust the fingers or bars of the picker head to the correct spacing
Reassemble the picker head once adjustments are made

tasks.task: Insert a replacement center buckle into the combine harvester's deck plate
subtasks: Locate the damaged or broken center buckle on the deck plate
Remove the old buckle using appropriate tools
Prepare the new center buckle, ensuring it is the correct size and type
Insert the new buckle into the deck plate fixture
Secure the new buckle in place with screws or fasteners

tasks.task: Drive a grain truck to transport harvested grain from the combine harvester
subtasks: Enter the grain truck’s cab
Start the grain truck’s engine
Check the grain tank for available space before traveling
Drive the grain truck to the combine harvester's location
Connect the grain tank to the combine harvester for unloading
After unloading, drive the grain truck to the storage facility or processing plant
Unload the grain truck at the designated location
Return the grain truck to the field for reloading

tasks.task: Align the combine harvester’s header with the row of crops to be harvested
subtasks: Adjust the combine harvester’s front wheels using the steering mechanism
Engage the header height control to set the proper cutting height
Ensure proper overlap between the header and crop rows

tasks.task: Operate the combine harvester’s fan to manage airflow for threshing
subtasks: Check the fan speed using the control panel
Adjust fan settings based on crop type and moisture content
Monitor the separation efficiency and make adjustments as needed

tasks.task: Adjust the concave setting on the combine harvester to optimize threshing and grain quality
subtasks: Refer to the operator manual for appropriate concave gaps
Loosen the concave retaining bolts using a wrench or socket set
Modify the concave position for the desired distance from the stecator
Retighten the bolts securely

tasks.task: Clear tangled vines from the combine harvester’s header
subtasks: Stop the combine harvester to safely access the header area
Use tools such as a pole or rake to separate tangled vines
Manually remove or cut loose any stuck vegetation
Inspect the header for any further damage or wear
